Overview

Welcome, this blog will serve as a log that I will update each work day for my apprenticeship at Clean Coders over the coming months. Eventually this will be archived into my portfolio after the conclusion of my apprenticeship. Here I intend to share my thoughts working at Clean Coders, and express what I have learned and struggled on in detail.
